import React from"react";import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";// üî• Dynamick√Ω import JSON souboru
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const loadEventData=eventName=>{try{return require(`./events/${eventName.replace(/\s+/g,"-").toLowerCase()}.json`);}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Event data not found:",eventName);return null;}};const EventDetail=()=>{const{eventName}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const eventData=loadEventData(eventName);if(!eventData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-red-600",children:"\u274C Event data not found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),className:"back-button",children:"\u2B05\uFE0F Back to Events"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate("/"),className:"back-button",children:"\u2B05\uFE0F Back to Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"event-title",children:eventData.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"event-date",children:eventData.date}),eventData.schedule&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:eventData.schedule,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"event-schedule",children:"\uD83D\uDCC4 Event Schedule"}),eventData.disciplines.map((day,dayIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-day",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"day-title cursor-pointer",onClick:()=>document.getElementById(`day-${dayIndex}`).classList.toggle("hidden"),children:["Day ",day.day," - ",day.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:`day-${dayIndex}`,className:"hidden disciplines-list",children:day.events.filter(event=>!event.hidden).map((event,eventIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"discipline-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"discipline-name text-blue-500 cursor-pointer underline",onClick:()=>navigate(`/event/${eventName}/discipline/${event.name.replace(/\s+/g,"-").toLowerCase()}`),children:event.listDisplayName||event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"discipline-links",children:[event.startList&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:event.startList,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"discipline-link",children:"\uD83D\uDCC2 StartList"}),event.results&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:event.results,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"discipline-link",children:"\uD83C\uDFC6 Results"})]})]},eventIndex))})]},dayIndex))]});};export default EventDetail;
